meanings.sent1: Winning the lottery is an improbable event.
meanings.sent2: It is improbable for pigs to fly.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog is quite improbable!
meanings.sent4: Her success story is an improbable tale of triumph.
meanings.sent5: The chances of finding a needle in a haystack are as improbable as finding a diamond in the sand.

meanings.definition: Unbelievable or unlikely to be true.
meanings.sent1: The magician performed an improbable trick.
meanings.sent2: The story he told was so improbable that no one believed him.
meanings.sent3: It's improbable that aliens would visit Earth just for pizza!
meanings.sent4: Her explanation for the missing cookies was as improbable as a ghost eating them.
meanings.sent5: The detective solved the case using an improbable clue hidden in plain sight.
